articles.description: Cybercriminals are exploiting a zero-day vulnerability in WinRAR to target financial traders and steal funds from brokerage accounts.

Cybercriminals are exploiting a zero-day vulnerability in WinRAR, the venerable shareware archiving tool for Windows, to target traders and steal funds.
